Package arcade.patch.env.lattice

Class PatchLattice

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.env.lattice.PatchLattice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Lattice, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatchLatticeRect, PatchLatticeTri
    public abstract class PatchLattice
extends java.lang.Object
implements Lattice
    Abstract implementation of Lattice for patch models.

    PatchLattice agents can call two Operation categories: diffusers and generators. Diffusers diffuse values on the underlying array. Generators add values to the underlying array.

    General order of rules for the PatchLattice step:

    • step generator operation
    • step diffuser operation
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        length - the length of array (x direction)
        width - the width of array (y direction)
        height - the height of array (z direction)
        ds - the spatial scaling (x and y directions)
        dz - the spatial scaling (z direction)
        parameters - the dictionary of parameters
